name: Overflow
dataText: This action is overflowing. It will continue to level up even if you stop putting effort into it.

name: Ganbaru
dataText: You earn Ganbaru Points by going above and beyond at your job. Working beyond your required hours, or getting more done through the day with higher levels of Skill and Knowledge will further increase your Ganbaru Points.

name: Free Time
dataText: Free Time is a necessary part of life, but you don't need very much of it to stay happy. The number will change red if you're too low on free time, and your efficiency will suffer as a result.

name: Low Free Time
dataText: You don't get enough free time during the day to recover before the next one! Your efficiency is reduced.

name: Yen
dataText: The yen is the official currency of Japan. You'll want a lot of it to live an extravagant life and eventually fund your heirs' educations.

name: Skill
dataText: Skill is one of the three stats that improve your Job Performance. Grow in skill to gain promotions more quickly! Impress your friends and colleagues with how skilled you are at being a Salaryman.

name: Boss Opinion
dataText: Your boss' opinion of your ability as an employee. It will reset when you are promoted past your current boss.

name: Coworker Opinion
dataText: Your coworkers' opinion of you as a worker. Build this up to appear as a super-salaryman to your peers.

name: Salaryman
dataText: Your job is where you do your work. Focus on aspects of your job to get promoted and become the CEO!

name: House
dataText: Your house is where your heart is. You can buy furniture, get a more expensive house and spend time improving it to improve your overall enjoyment of life.

name: Self
dataText: Spend time growing and improving your base stats. More options for self-improvement can be unlocked by buying furniture and more expensive houses.

name: Office
dataText: The office is where you get work done. Get to know who you work with, accelerate your promotion growth, and complete work projects for promotion boosts.

name: Comfort
dataText: Comfort is a measure of how comfortable your home is. Homes have a base comfort, and adding furniture can increase it. Be careful, though, duplicate furniture provides diminishing returns!

name: Convenience
dataText: Convenience is a measure of how efficient you can be at home. More expensive furniture can really add to the convenience of your home and make your time at home much better spent.

name: Relationship Points
dataText: Relationship points build as you interact with people. Meeting certain thresholds unlocks new interactions with them, depending on your relation to the person.

name: Auto Advance
dataText: Automatically advance to the next step of the project when it becomes available. You can set the level you want it to advance at on the right of the action bar.

name: Pension Desc.
dataText: Your pension builds up over time as you work. Every generation can choose to withdraw the pension to fund their heir, or deposit it into the Family Vault.
